name: theBestKeyboardEver
short_description:
Computer technology has evolved to intuitive interaction schemes like touch and move. The key board interface still remains as dumb as ever. While everything in your OS can be customized, from placement to color, from function to layout, the on screen keyboards can't be customized.

The best keyboard ever (BeKE, pronounced as bee-key) is a welcome change. It allows the user to:
- Have an exact same layout of the on-screen keyboard as your physical keyboard
- Allows the use of Ctrl, Function, Windows and other keys
- Create custom shortcuts and store then as keys
- Create new key layouts
- Use swipe functionality
- Use custom dictionaries

Best of all its FREE and Open Source.
summary: A fully customizable on screen keyboard for the touchscreen era
